articles.title: South Africa cricket great Procter dies aged 77
articles.description: Former South Africa all-rounder Mike Procter dies aged 77, his family say.
articles.content:
Mike Procter (left) and Barry Richards both had limited international careers as South Africa were banned between 1970 and 1991

articles.title: News24 | Mike Procter, SA cricket legend and Proteas' first post-isolation coach, dies at 77
articles.description: World cricketing great Mike Procter died in an Umhlanga private hospital on Saturday afternoon.
articles.content: World cricketing great Mike Procter died in an Umhlanga private hospital on Saturday afternoon.
